title: Prestigious Smart Duplex with Pool Access and Home Office in Elegant Bronowice
description: Experience refined living in this luxuriously appointed 4-bedroom, 3-bathroom duplex covering a generous 178 sqm. Designed for ultimate comfort, the residence offers contemporary open-plan interiors complemented by elegant finishes and spacious balconies overlooking landscaped gardens. With a dedicated home office, expansive living zones, and intelligent amenities, every detail here enriches your lifestyle—a rare find for discerning buyers in Krakow.

Enjoy serene surroundings close to green parks, ideal for daily relaxation or recreation with your pets. An active outdoor lifestyle is a hallmark here, yet the local vibe also appeals to families seeking a safe, inviting community.
